rules: Do not hardcode colors or fonts; use exported theme tokens.
Dark is default; emerald/teal are accents only.
Sidebar widths and TopNav height are global, not overridable.
Tables use borders, zebra rows, sticky headers.
Sortable tables expose aria-sort + live announcements.
All interactive elements must have proper focus states.
Keyboard navigation must work for all interactive elements.
Form validation must provide clear visual feedback.
Toast notifications must be accessible and non-intrusive.
Timer states must be clearly distinguished with appropriate colors.
Caching system must be transparent to users.
Staging system must provide clear visual feedback for unsaved changes.
Cross-tab state management must work seamlessly.
Responsive design must work on all screen sizes.
Accessibility must be maintained across all features.

required_patterns: min-h-[40px] min-w-[40px] for all interactive elements

keyboard_navigation: Arrow keys for navigation within components

caching: Local cache with staged changes overlay
Force refresh capability for data updates

consistency.spacing: Use consistent gap and padding values
consistency.colors: Use theme tokens for all colors
consistency.typography: Use theme scale for all text sizes
consistency.interactions: Use consistent hover and focus states
